cognitiveprocessdesigner-desc: Draw BPMN processes with a graphical user interface in Semantic MediaWiki
cpd-err-display-diagram: The system could not display the diagram.
cpd-enter-bpmn-id-placeholder: Please enter the ID of your BPMN
cpd-overwrite-wiki-page-question: Wiki page already exists. Do you wish to overwrite?
cpd-open-bpmn-from-local-file: Open BPMN diagram from local file system
cpd-err-import-warning: Diagram may not render correctly due to import warnings.
cpd-warning-message-lost-data: The changes you performed on the diagram will be lost
right-cognitiveprocessdesigner-viewspeci: Access to the [[Special:Cognitive Process Designer Edit]] special page
cpd-tag-bpmn-example: Here is an example of simple usage of the BPMN tag
cpd-api-save-diagram-elements-update-com: Update of diagram element after diagram saving.
cpd-api-save-diagram-elements-param-elem: JSON encoded array of diagram elements to be added (or updated if already exist) into the wiki. Each element must contain "title" and "content" keys with corresponding title and content for wiki page.
cpd-api-delete-orphaned-elements-param-e: JSON encoded array of diagram elements to be deleted from wiki, because they were removed from diagram. Each element of the array must contain title of corresponding wiki page.
cpd-api-delete-orphaned-elements-update-: Mark element as orphaned to remove it.
cpd-saving-error-elements-save: Failed posting diagram elements to wiki
apihelp-cpd-save-diagram-elements-summar: Saves elements of BPMN diagram as wiki pages, or updates them if already exist
apihelp-cpd-delete-orphaned-elements-sum: Deletes elements of BPMN diagram, which were removed
